name: Thread-Bound Constrictor Snake
movement: walks at a speed of 30 feet
description: A large, snake-like construct with immense physical strength, capable of grappling foes.
memorable: Its ability to grapple and restrain opponents makes it a terrifying adversary in close combat.
goals: Typically serves as a guardian or combatant protecting a specific area or object.
relations: Often created by powerful spellcasters or inventors, may be accompanied by other constructs.
environment: Commonly found in areas protected by magic or within the domains of its creator.
strengths: Immunity to poison and ability to resist nonmagical physical damage.
weaknesses: Highly susceptible to effects from antimagic fields, which can incapacitate it.
attacks: Utilizes its constricting attack to deal significant bludgeoning damage and immobilize its targets.
most_powerful_ability: The Constrict ability grapples and restrains opponents, increasing the chance for further damage.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to sense nearby creatures without sight.
additional_information: Can move through very narrow spaces without restriction.
All weapon attacks are considered magical, bypassing nonmagical resistances.
Immune to effects that would alter its physical form.
test_queries: powerful construct snake with special abilities
snake that is vulnerable to antimagic fields
